english: Here!
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: The word "proszę" (please) is an amazing and very universal word in Polish.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Pomaga nam ono {{c2::w}} {{c3::bardzo}} wielu sytuacjach życia codziennego {{c4::i}} ma też wiele różnych znaczeń.
english: It helps us in many different situations of everyday life and it also has many different meanings.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Przez {{c2::to}}, {{c3::to}} {{c4::słowo}} {{c5::może}} sprawiać trochę trudności, {{c6::ale}} {{c7::nie}} martwcie {{c8::się}}. Zaraz Wam wszystko wyjaśnimy {{c9::i}} będziecie {{c10::go}} używać {{c12::jak}} prawdziwi {{c11::Polacy}}.
english: Because of that, this word can cause a bit of trouble, but don't worry. We'll explain you everything and you'll use it like native Poles.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: There are two things that for the beginning you need to know/about the word "proszę".
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::Po}} pierwsze, {{c3::to}} {{c4::jest}} takie {{c5::słowo}}, które pomaga nam być uprzejmym.
english: Firstly, it's a word that helps us to be polite.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Często można by je nawet pominąć w zdaniu, {{c2::ale}} świadczy ono o naszej kulturze osobistej {{c3::i}} szacunku {{c4::do}} rozmówcy.
english: Often we could even omit it in a sentence, but its an evidence of our propriety and respect for the. person you're speaking to.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: Secondly, "proszę" is simply the verb "to ask for something” in the first person: I ask.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Możemy {{c2::go}} więc używać, kiedy chcemy kogoś grzecznie o coś poprosić.
english: Therefore, we can use it when we want to politely ask someone for something.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: Can you open this for me, please?
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: But that's not the whole role of the word "proszę" in the Polish language.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::Bardzo}} często używamy {{c3::go}}, gdy komuś coś dajemy, wręczamy drugiej osobie jakiś przedmiot.
english: Very often we use it when we give something to somebody, we hand another person an object.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Gdybyśmy chcielisbyć super uprzejmi {{c2::albo}} dać coś komuś zwielkim entuzjazmem, {{c3::to}} możemy również powiedzieć "proszę bardzo".
english: If we wanted to be super polite or give something to somebody with huge enthusiasm, we can also say "proszę bardzo".
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: Its a bit like saying "proszę", but more.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: Thank you, whats the occasion? - Theres no occasion.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Zawsze używamy tego {{c2::słowa}} też, {{c3::kiedy}} przepuszczamy kogoś {{c4::w}} drzwiach {{c5::i}} {{c6::chcemy}} zapewnić tę osobę, żeby śmiało weszła przed nami.
english: We also always use this word when we let someone go ahead of us in a door and we want to assure this person to freely go in front of us.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: Go ahead. - Thanks!
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::A}} skoro już o drzwiach mowa, {{c3::to}} {{c4::słowa}} "proszę" używamy, {{c5::kiedy}}; ktośpuka {{c6::do}} drzwi, {{c7::a}} {{c8::my}} {{c9::chcemy}}, żeby wszedł {{c10::do}} środka.
english: Since we're already talking about doors, then we use the word "proszę" when someone is knocking on a door, and we want them to come in.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Możemy się {{c2::z}} tym spotkać, {{c3::kiedy}} idziemy {{c4::do}} lekarza, pukamy {{c5::do}} gabinetu lekarskiego, {{c6::a}} lekarz odpowiada "proszę" {{c7::i}} wtedy możemy śmiało wchodzić do środka.
english: We can encounter this when we go to a doctor, we're knocking on a doctors office, and the doctor is answering "proszę" and then we can freely come inside.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: "Proszę?" powiemy też, {{c2::kiedy}} kogoś nie usłyszeliśmy.  {{c3::i}} {{c4::chcemy}} poprosić go, żeby jeszcze raz powtórzył {{c5::to}}, {{c6::co}} właśnie powiedział.
english: Well also say "proszę?", when we haven't heard someone and we want to ask them to repeat one more time what they've just said.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Można by {{c2::w}} tej sytuacji powiedzieć "co?", {{c3::ale}} "proszę" {{c4::jest}} dużo bardziej uprzejme.  Proszę?
english: We could say "co?" (what?) in this situation, but "proszę" is much more polite.  Excuse me?
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Istnieje też {{c2::w}} {{c3::języku}} {{c4::polskim}} taka konstrukcja {{c5::jak}} "proszę pani" {{c6::i}} "proszę pana".
english: There's also a construction in the Polish language like "proszę pana” (sir) and "proszę pani" (miss).
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::Na}} przykład dzieci {{c3::w}} szkole zawsze zwracają się {{c4::tak}} {{c5::do}} pań {{c6::nauczycielek}}: "{{c7::Proszę pani, proszę pani!}}”
english: For example, children always address their teachers in this way: "Miss, miss!”
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::Proszę pana}}! {{c3::Ale}} {{c4::to}} {{c5::nie}} {{c6::jest}} infolinia {{c7::pana}} banku.  {{c8::Proszę}} sprawdzić, {{c9::czy}} pań'żadzwonił pod {{c10::dobry}} {{c11::numer}}.
english: Sir! But this isn't the helpline of your bank.  Please check whether you've called the right number.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::Ale}} ponieważ byłoby {{c3::za}} prosto, gdyby "proszę" {{c4::było}} {{c5::tylko}} wyrazem uprzejmości, {{c6::jest}} {{c7::też}} kilka innych kontekstów, {{c8::w}} których możemy {{c9::go}} użyć.
english: But because it would be too easy if "proszę" was only a way of expressing.politeness, there are also a few other contexts in which we can use it.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::Na}} przykład {{c3::w}} połączeniu {{c4::ze}} {{c5::słowem}} "no" {{c6::albo}} "o" {{c7::jest}} wyrazem takiego lekkiego zdziwienia, zaskoczenia.
english: For example, in a combination with the word "no" or "o" is an expression of a slight wonder, surprise.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: Well, well! Well, well!
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::No}} stara, {{c3::i}} {{c5::te}} zdjęcia {{c4::na}} {{c10::tą}} nową stronę, trzeba {{c8::się}} umówić {{c6::z}} Dawidem {{c7::i}} jakoś {{c9::to}} ogarnąć...
english: Hey, and those pictures for the new website, we need to make an appointment with Dawid and figure it out...

english: You were suppośed to not have the time to meet today. (But) I'm here!

english: There's also a saying that I really: like: "proszę cię" (oh please).
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::W}} sytuacji, {{c3::w}} {{c4::której}} Justyna panikuje i stresuje {{c5::się}}, {{c6::że}} {{c7::nie}} {{c8::mamy}} gotowego Odcinka {{c9::na}} czwartek, {{c10::ja}} {{c11::jej}} {{c12::na}} {{c13::to}} {{c14::mówię}}: "{{c15::Proszę cię}}, ogarniemy!"
english: In a situation in which Justyna is panicking and stressed that our episode is not ready for Thursday, I tell her: "Oh please, well figure it out!"
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: {{c2::I}} wtedy {{c3::to}} oznacza, {{c4::że}} ma {{c5::nie}} panikować i się {{c6::nie}} {{c7::stresować}}.
english: And then it means that she's not supposed to panic and stress.
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

polish: Ej Pati, {{c2::bo}} {{c3::jeszcze}} musimy {{c4::tą}} scenę {{c5::z}} tymil drzwiami, tą wodę {{c6::i}} zachód słońca {{c7::już}} {{c8::jest}} {{c9::za}} {{c10::15}} {{c11::minut}}.  {{c12::Proszę cię}}, Justyna, ogarniemy!
english: Hey Pati, so we still need (to record) the scene with the door, the water, and the sunset is in 15 minutes.  Oh please, Justyna, we!ll figure it out!
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: We hope that now you know where and how. to use the word "proszę".
video_title: 8 Ways to Use the Word PROSZĘ in Polish | Super Easy Polish 15

english: In the comments please definitely let us know in which situations you usually encounter this word.
